author: Staff Reporter
text:
Special camps for inclusion of names in the final electoral roll is being held here in all 1,419 voting booths on Sunday. The final roll that was released on January 20, with January 1, 2016 as the qualifying date was kept for display for the perusal of the public.

Eligible voters, whose names were left out, can avail the camps to apply online on Form 6.; for deletion of names on Form 7 and 8; and for transfer of names from within the constituency on Form 8 A.
title: Special camps
